item.title: GANGGA - Whiskey Bottle
item.description:
I lost my way
I try to drink you away
Go away
So drunk all alone
To pretend that you were gone
You were gone

We were so tragic
But it was magic

I wish I could forget you
And find someone new
But it’s not easy for me
It’s always you at the bottom
Of my whiskey bottle
Over and over again

We were so tragic
But it was magic

I’ve seen all the pain
No it’s not the same
Not the same

I let you take all my pride
Just to make you feel right
Hoo ooh ooh

I wish I could forget you
And find someone new
But it’s not easy for me
It’s always you at the bottom
Of my whiskey bottle
Over and over again

We were so tragic
But it was magic
